text: Paolo Knill (June 11, 1932 - September 13, 2020) was a Swiss scientist, artist, and therapist. Knill was a professor at Lesley University in Cambridge, Massachusetts. He was a founder of their Expressive Arts Therapy. In 1994, Knill founded the European Graduate School in Saas-Fee, Switzerland. He was born in Zurich. Knill died on September 13, 2020 at the age of 88.Paolo Knill ==References== Category:1932 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Swiss artists Category:Swiss academics Category:Scientists from ZÃ¼rich Category:20th-century artists
